resources.string: Your background can\'t stop you from getting to your destination, be positive and never stop striving until you get there.
A man without shoes, when he sees a man without feet, he will thank his God, so be contended with what you have.
Live while you are still living, don\'t die without maximizing your potentials.
Treat others the way you want to be treated.
If your action inspires others to dream more, learn more and do more, then you are a leader.
Gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder. We make a living by what we get, we make life by what we give.
Never give up in life, once there is life, there is hope! We will part to meet again. Congratulations and success in all we do. Let\'s explore!
God is love.
Money is not easy to get, but talent is difficult to develop.
The secret of Godly greatness is humility, just be humble and beyond the skies will be your limit.
The key for elevation is self love, when you cherish your own self.
Love and be loved.
What doesn\'t kill you, makes you stronger.
"Nemo dat quod non habet"\n When things go wrong, don\'t go wrong with them.
Now the real life starts.
Jude 1 vs 22.
For I know the plans I have for you declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
The seeds of kindness you plant today will blossom into blessing for the future.
Strive for greatness. The time is always right to do what is right.
The path to genuine success is littered with obstacles, only those who preserve to the end become successful.
Sometimes the greatest way to say something is to say nothing at all.
I can do all things through christ who strengthens me.
A single step in the right direction will pave your future with gold.
Do the best you can for humanity.
Don\'t stress about the closed doors behind you, new doors are opening if you keep moving forward.
Think, talk and live positively.
For all you do in life, put God first for he determines success and give victory.
Every next level of your life will demand a different you; don\'t wait to see the whole staircase, just take a step.
Whatever you find doing, put in your best, humility is the key.
Be yourself.
It wasn\'t an easy journey but as usual "THE LION owns the jungle.\n Thanks.
Life is a quest, conquer it.
All man for himself. One God for us all.
Execute.
Do more work on your character than your reputation. Your reputation is what people think you are while your character is who you are. Above all, be happy loving and be loved.
Be a source of inspiration to people, help someone where you deem capable, let someone say "Because of you, I didn\'t give up!".
Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you are, so be yourself.
Don\'t chase people, be yourself, do your own thing and work hard. The right people, the ones who really belong in your life, will come to you and stay.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishments.
Live life with diligence, decode your own epic.
Set your priorities right. God over everything.
Don\'t stop because you are tired but stop because you have finished.
Work as if you don\'t need money. Dance as if nobody is watching. Love as if you never cried. Learn as if you will live forever. Just be happy. Appreciate what you have.\n #Dj Ozone.
The you in you makes you the you, you are.
The world is a global village, so do to others what you want them to do to you.
Not all scars show, not all wounds heal, not all illness can be seen, not all pain is obvious. Please remember this before you judge someone.
I\'m nothing without God, He\'s still God without me.
Whatsoever you do for people is your worth to them.
No one can motivate you until you motivate yourself.
Quitters never win.
Don\'t let the person in you kill the desire in you. Keep burning.
Christ in you, the hope of glory.
The best way to create your future is to first create an opportunity.
White is not always light. Black is not always dark.
Popularity is not a day\'s job.
Whatever the activity in which you engage, do it with all your ability because there\'s no work, no planning, no learning and no wisdom in the next world where you\'re given.
Do good to people, not because they deserve it but because it is right.
Always see a positive end from the beginning.
There is always light at the end of the tunnel. Stay focused.
There\'s always room for improvement.
Being yourself is the best you can be.
Lets learn to care and love one another without expecting material gifts from our loved ones. If it will help us understand human values and worth.
Be pretty, dress well, be prayerful and above all, be educated. You will always seem to stand out.
Success is when preparations meets opportunity.
He who thinks doesn\'t run. He who run doesn\'t think.
No police No my name.
No Quote provided yet.
Never give up!
Knowledge is like a crop, it can never be harvested if not cultivated. Divinity does nothing for humanity until someone prays.
Determination with God\'s grace leads to success. Christ is my solid rock.
There is always another chance for everything in life, but the fact is that there is no chance of another life. So let us dream it, mean it, love it and live it.
Not everything that counts should be counted and not everything that\'s counted truly counts.
Keep pushing, keep working, keep praying till you make it.
The choices you make effect changes in your life.
The forces of political monopoly and economic monopsory will always lead to the monotony of failure.
One with God is majority.
Just do it.
It is not an easy road, but with God it is easy. Always put God first in all you do in life. Be a witness, not a judge. Focus on yourself, not on others. Listen to your heart , not to the crowd.

It doesn\'t matter what you are or what you went through. God\'s eyes is open very wide and all you need is to believe that all things are possible. Remember history doesn\'t talk about gutters. God is the greatest!
Your imagination is your preview of life\'s coming attractions.
Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.
It all becomes clearer at the end.
No Quote provided yet.
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be a value.
Aim higher, never settle for less.
Grace is all.
Life is a race. Run it and run yours. Una bye bye abeg.
It\'s a small world.
Do the good you can now that you can.
One who loves eating two eggs at a time does not know when he consumes a hen and a cock together.
Values and virtues are not hereditary, they are learned.
Unless you urinate on a spot it will never foam.
My hustle moves on!!!
Be beautiful, be happy. Life is too short to be unhappy.
Life is my message.
For we work by faith, not by sight.
The people who don\'t study have very less things to think upon. Always love books.
Light the world.
Always make the right decision because we live by the decisions we make.
In all you do, put God first.
Humility and kindness can lead to God.
